titleStmt.title: SII 8.69: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 69. (A.R. No. 480 of 1902). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME PRAKARA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kārvaḷarmeṉik kamalakkaṇṇaṉ pārvaḷa runtip pallavarperumāṉ cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravatti kūṭalavaṉiyāḷappiṟantāṉ kopperuñciṅkaṉ kuraikaḻaṟkāṭavaṉ coṉmaṟaiyākkaṉ cuṭarvā ḷeṭuttup piṉvara naṭantu pilan tiṟantaruḷiya kāvalartampirāṉ kaṇṇā ramuta raruṇamālvaraip perumāḷtamakkuc ceyta tiruppaṇi terinteṭut turaippiṟ kātiṟ kampiyuṅ katirmaṇi makuṭamuñ ceṅkati reṟikku maṅkacuttamum pākuvalaiyamum paimpoṟ palatoḻiṟ tiruvuṭaiyāṭaiyun tirukkaḻaṟ kiḻiṭum
petaipātamum piṟaṅkiruṭkaṇṭamu miḷañāyiṟṟi ṉeḻiṉiṟan toṉṟa vaḷarmāṇikkavāḷi veyi larumpiya virikaṭa lavaṉiyāḷappiṟantāṉ tiruvācikaiyuñ ciṅkācaṉamuṅ kaṟpaka virukkamu muttiṉpantalu moṭari maikka ṇumai yicaipāṭi Āṭiya vatiruṅ kaḻaṟ perumāḷuk kiṉamāṇikka milaṅkac ceyta paratamvallaperumāḷeṉṉun tiruvācikaiyuñ ciṟanta ceṅkati roḷi viḷaṅku māṇikkamun tuḷaṅkum vayiramuṅ kaṭṭiya polaṉ taruk kūṭa mañcaṉamuṅ kaṇṇā ramutar kāmakkoṭṭat tuṇṇāmulaiyā mumaiyavaḷtaṉakkup parumaṇi niraitta tiruvuṭaiyā
ṭaiyum veṉṟi velkoṇṭu kuṉṟeṟi murukaṉ ceṉṉiṟa meṉiyun teviyar meṉiyu maiññiṟat tokai vaṇṇamu maṭai yap poṉṉiṟa mākkiya poṟpaṇi palavu mallaikāvala ṉiccaṅkamallaṉ pallavarventaṉ paratamvallaṉ kūṭalavaṉiyāḷappiṟantāṉ ceytaṉa vippaṇi yaṭaṅkavu mivaṉ ciṟan tūḻikālam vāḻi . Ivaṉ makaṉ vāṭāvākaik kāṭavakumāraṉ vāṉpukaḻ mallaiyu mayilaiyuṅ kāñciyun taṇṭakanāṭun taṇpuṉaṟ pāliyum peṇṇaiyuṅ kovalum mevu kaiyu muṭaiyava ṉeṇṇaruñ ciṟappil yāvaru matitta
virutaril vīraṉ viṟal vīrācaṉi kariyanātaṉ kātaṟ kumaraṉ kuṭaticaik karunaṭar teṉpulaṅ kuṟukavum vaṭaticait teluṅkar vaṭakkirun taḻiyavum por pala kaṭantu poruntā maṉṉava rāreyiṟ cern tūr malai yaraṇaḻittu nallicaik kaṭām puṉai naṉṉaṉ veṟpil velpuka ḻaṉaittu mempaṭat taṅkoṉ vākaiyuṅ kuraṅkum vicaiyamun tiṭṭiya vaṭalpuṉai neṭuve lāṭkoṇṭatevaṉ kaṭakari muṉai mukaṅ kaṭanta kāṅkayaṉ kaṇṇāramutar kaṉaṅkuḻaiyākat taṇṇāmalaiyaṟ kaṉpukeḻu neñcil
viruppuṭaṉ ceyta tiruppaṇikkovai yāvaiyu meṭuttup pāvala ruraippil niṉṟa tolpukaḻ nilamuḻu taḷitta veṉṟipuṉaito ḷāṭkoṇṭatevaṉ veṇāvuṭaiyā ṉeṉṉum peyarā ṉīṇāḷ vāḻa nilaipeṟac ceyta perumā ḷamarun tirumaṇṭapamu marukkamaḻ kaṉakattiruppaḷi yaṟaiyun tiruvamuteṟṟum perumaṇṭapamum virivuṭaṉ cey tirukkākkaḷḷiyum peruviṟa lavaṉiyāḷappiṟantāṉ tirumaṇṭapamuñ ceḻumalar toṭutta kaṇ
ṇi vāṭātu kaṇṇimaiyātu maṇmicai naṭavā vāṉor valamvara veṇmati nilavil viḷaṅkucuṭa reṟikkum paṭittaḷa meṉṉavum paṭi muṉṟukku maṭittaḷa meṉṉavu maṭaiyā maṉṉavar malaittaḷam paṟit tammaṉṉavar cumantac cilaittaḷaṅ koṇṭu ceyta cilaittaḷamu mellaiyi lukantoṟuñ celvan tolaiyātu varumpaṭi vakutta niccaṅkamallaṉ perumpaṇṭāramum piṟaimuṭipperumā ḷiṉṉāḷ vantiruntamai toṉṟavu muṉṉā ḷaḷanta muṟaimai
kāṇavum vāṭṭaṭaṅkaṇṇiyar maṉaitoṟum pali koḷak kāṭṭiya vaṭiviṟ kaṅkāḷaveṭamum vāṉmukat tamarar vaṇaṅkac ceyta nāṉmukat teru nāyaki taṉakku mappaṭi vakutta vaṇi neṭunteruvuñ ceppiya katiravar ticaivalampotuñ cotinaṉmaṇi vitikaḷ yilaṅkak kalaipayil tavattor nilaipeṟa virukka malaivakuttaṉaiya kāṅkayaṉmaṭamuṅ kāṉiṟ payiluṅ kaṭavuḷartamakku ve
ṉiṟ teṉṟal viyaṉperuṅ kavari yirumaruṅ kiraṭṭavu mimaiyavar tutikkavu marumaṇam perukiya vāḷvalaperumāḷ tiruneṭuntoppun tittamākiya vamuta naṉṉati yaṉaittilun tūya tamiṇāṭukāttaperumāḷ taṭākamum vaṇṭicai pāṭal matumalar vācaṅ koṇṭa kāṭavakumāraṉ toppuṅ kaviṉ vemparik katirvaḻi taṭutta vavaṉiyāḷappiṟantāṉtoppun talanika
ḻ ceṉaittalaivaṉ toppum vemmaināḷil veñcura ṉaṭantavar tammaṉaṅ kuḷirat taṇṭalai niḻaṟceyu mammaimaṭamu maiyyaṉeriyum veṟpakan tuḷaitteṉak kaṟpuṭaiyarāki yaṭaṉeṭum pilatti lamutuvanteḻuntavaṭivāḷvallaperumāḷkiṇaṟu maḷimural kamalamu māmpalu malarntu kuḷirpuṉaṟ kāṭavakumāraṉtaṭākamuṅ kuṉṟukaraiyaṉṉa koṭuyar neṭuṅkarai veṉṟuma
laikoṇṭaperumāḷeriyuñ curartaru neruṅkiya colaiyumovvāp paratamvallaperumāḷtoppum vaḷañimiṟārkku maṭaliḷampāḷai viraikamaḻ virarāyaṉtoppun tavaneṟic cuntarar tam peruṅkulattiṟ ta ṟkuc ceytukuṭutta kaṭaleṉa niṟaintu kārvayal viḷaikkum vic cai niccaṅkamallaṉeriyuṅ kāṅkayaṉtaṭākamuṅ kāṅkayaṉmaṭamum pūṅkamaḻ colaiyum
poṟpuṭaṉ viḷaṅka yivvakai yāvaiyuñ ceytaṉa ṉataṉāṟ pāvaipākaṉ cevaṭittāmarai yaṇinta ceṉṉiyar pāṟkuṅ kaṇṇiṉa raṇinta niṟṟiṉa rākama naṉṉeṟipaṭinta neñciṉar paracamaiyaṅkaṭaṉai kaṭinta vāṇaiyar kaṇṇutaṟperumā ṉātinātanāy veṭaṅkoṇṭu pāypuṉaṟ kaṅkai yāyiramukaṅkoṇ ṭārtteḻu maṉṉā ḷeṟṟukkoṇṭa tiruntiya piṟaimuṭi yaruntavac caṭātara rātiyi lañceḻut
totiya toṇṭareṉ ṟeṇṇiya nāṟpatteṇṇāyiravarun tiruvaru ḷivaṉmel vaittaṉa rirunilantaṉṉi liṉituvāḻ keṉave .
Digital edition of SII 8.69 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
